programme.title: Home Away From Home S4
programme.desc: This lifestyle programme celebrates Filipino stories abroad as it chronicles Filipino communities all over the world and explores cultural exchanges of Filipinos in their home away from home.

programme.title: Tao Po
programme.desc: This programme features short narratives spanning a wide range of compelling topics from hot issues, inspiring human interest pieces, popular trends, profiles and entertainment.

programme.title: The B Side S2
programme.desc: The B Side is back, and it's realer, deeper and more unfiltered than ever. This season, Bianca Gonzalez dives into the untold stories of your favourite artists.

programme.title: Chef RV's Kitchen S19
programme.desc: Chef RV's Kitchen brings you a collection of cooking and baking video tutorials by chef restaurateur and award-winning cookbook author, RV Manabat.

programme.title: Citizen Pinoy
programme.desc: This US-produced talk show discusses frequently-asked questions about US migration. It provides the stage for engaging talk that highlights topics relevant to our kababayans in the US and the Philippines.

programme.title: TV Patrol Regional
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: TV Patrol Linggo Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Rainbow Rumble (Sun)
programme.desc: Hosted by Luis Manzano, Rainbow Rumble is a trivia game show where five players race to reach the peak of a colour pyramid in a bid to advance to the jackpot round with one million pesos at stake!

programme.title: Your Face Sounds Familiar (Sun)
programme.desc: Family members face-to-face, sound-to-face! Now hosted by Vhong Navarro and Jhong Hilario, the reality show that transformed the weekend viewing of Filipinos is back!

programme.title: Rated Korina
programme.desc: Join host Korina Sanchez as she seeks out people from all walks of life, weaving together their individual stories to paint a larger picture of the society we live in.

programme.title: Sa Likod Ng Balita 2025: The ABSCBN Yearend Special
programme.desc: This special takes viewers behind the headlines of the year's biggest stories to reveal the faces, facts and feelings often unseen in the daily news.

programme.title: ASAP
programme.desc: The longest-running, multi-award winning musical variety show in the Philippines, ASAP features the best musical talent the country has to offer.

programme.desc: The B Side is back, and it's realer, deeper and more unfiltered than ever. This season, Bianca Gonzalez dives into the untold stories of your favourite artists.

programme.title: Wow
programme.desc: TFC continues to bring you the best of Filipino TV, movie and event entertainment, as well as timely news information that directly impacts your community!

programme.title: Tulong Ko Pasa Mo
programme.desc: Fill your weekends with joy and inspiration on this public service programme.

programme.title: TVP Sabado
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: TVP Linggo

programme.title: Kapamilya Daily Mass
programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: Radyo Patrol Balita
programme.desc: Radyo Patrol Balita focuses on delivering the latest news, breaking events, and important issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: Tandem Ng Bayan
programme.desc: Tandem Ng Bayan brings you discussions on the day's top news stories, providing analysis and engaging in commentary on political as well as social issues.

programme.title: Magandang Buhay LIVE
programme.desc: "Momshies" Jolina Magdangal, Melai Cantiveros, and Regine Velasquez kick off the morning with good vibes as they share a chat with celebrities on topics easily relatable to Filipino families.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: It's Showtime LIVE
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'X And Y'
programme.desc: Ysha wants to travel to make amends with people she hurt in the past. Xander needs money to support his family. The two accidentally meet- - will love to find its way through them too?

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Global Pinoy Unlimited
programme.desc: Global Pinoy Unlimited features community news, Pinoy headliners and their significant contributions to the community, as well as special kababayan and Kapuso happenings across the globe.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'X And Y'
programme.desc: Ysha wants to travel to make amends with people she hurt in the past. Xander needs money to support his family. The two accidentally meet- - will love to find its way through them too?

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'Working Boys 2 Choose Your Papa'
programme.desc: Inspired by the 1986 Working Boys of the TVJ (Tito, Vic & Joey), about the bums who need to strategize in life. peace.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: The Boobay And Tekla Show
programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Pulis Probinsya (Pat. Omar Abdullah)
programme.desc: A cop from the province gets a new assignment in the big city. He was disappointed to find out that he would be living and working in a different turf where the games played are almost always deadly.

programme.title: Pangako Sa'yo
programme.desc: The Megastar Sharon Cuneta plays a business woman, investigated for drug smuggling by undercover agent, Bong Revilla. When suddenly, they find themselves in love with each other.

programme.title: Papunta Ka Pa Lang, Pabalik Na Ako
programme.desc: Gaston, a veteran police officer does not want Jojo, a rookie police asset, for his daughter. Jojo proves himself and he finds a sidekick in Jojo.

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Pablik Enemi 1 N 2: Aksidental Heroes
programme.desc: Redford White and Dennis Padilla team in this fast paced wacky adventure as two bumbling idiots on the run after accidentally picking up a suitcase full of smuggled goods.

programme.title: Babaeng Hinugot Sa Aking Tadyang
programme.desc: Homer (Eddie Rodriguez) is an avowed bachelor but meeting Proserfina (Vivian Velez) changes him. The intriguing lass comes and goes from his house, not committing to any kind of relationship. What is Proserfina's secret?

programme.title: Puga
programme.desc: Willy (Rudy Fernandez) tags along with Mogan (Paquito Diaz) and Waldo (Ruel Vernal) when they escaped from prison. Outside, the three continue with their criminal activities to support themselves. Soon, Willy falls in love with Mogan's niece, Leonor (Cherie Gil). Can Willy turn the tables on Mogan and Waldo and bring them to justice instead?

programme.title: Sambahin Mo Ang Katawan Ko
programme.desc: A mysterious girl descends on a fishing village and stirs up a storm by carrying on with two of the village's most coveted bachelors --- an engaged playboy and a rich seminarian.

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig Ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Isang Bala, Isang Buhay
programme.desc: Daniel is a hired assasin of Roman who heads a syndicate. He is now torn between choosing to start a new life with Dolores or returning Roman's favors.

programme.title: Sa Bingit Ng Kamatayan
programme.desc: Susan was about to go on a test flight with her mountaineer buddy, Daniel. They were about to take off when a group of desperados arrived and took them as hostages. Discover how they outlived this plane-crashing experience and got back the millions of pesos from these bad elements.

programme.title: Magic Kombat
programme.desc: Enter the world of mischief adventures and hilarious experiences in the video game land.

programme.title: Boy Recto
programme.desc: When a busy street - Claro M. Recto becomes living hell for students and young people, Boy Recto (Ronnie Ricketts) undertake a dangerous rescue mission to save the youngstersfrom attack by various gangsters.

programme.title: Captain Barbell (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Teng-Teng is an orphan who works by collecting junk from the streets. One day, as a rewards for his good deeds, he was given the magic barbel, which empowers him to be Captain Barbel.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: The Sarah Balabagan Story
programme.desc: All her life, she has known how it is to be poor. So at a tender age, she gives up her youth and flies off to a far country to earn the money that she hopes will lift her family from privation.

programme.title: Jessica Alfaro Story
programme.desc: One more look at the shocking Vizconde rape and murder case. This time, from the point of view of self-confessed star witness to the crime, the controversial Jessica Alfaro.

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Lupang Hinirang
programme.desc: Berting (Jestoni Alarcon) is a forklift operator in Don Franco's (Bernard Bonnin) quarry. Elena (Rina Reyes) is the Don's unica hija, heir to all of his fortune. Berting and Elena fall in love in the most unusual of circumstances.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-Ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Ang Syota Kong Balikbayan
programme.desc: There is a budding romance between FPJ and Anjanette Abayari who has just returned home after living for years in the United States. But before a love triangle could be resolved there was the problem of a bag of diamonds hidden in the gasoline tank of FPJ's jeepney.
